definition: to be mistreated/to be bullied
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Third category called" little wife" middle, be a yes-man, like a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 第三类叫“小媳妇型”中层，唯唯诺诺，像个受气包。

sentences.english: She's a doormat in the company, even the green hand can wrong her.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司就是个受气包，甚至新手也可以欺负她。

sentences.english: Even I bought everything Shouqi , I stupid ah.
sentences.chinese: 就连我买东西都受气，我傻啊。

sentences.english: Speak out what you want to say, don't just like a doormat!
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是一个受气包，什么都不敢反抗。

sentences.english: Are victims suffer indignities hiding in the room, comfort and channel is d. rosy clouds come in.
sentences.chinese: 正婷受气躲在房里，彩霞进来安慰并开导正婷。

sentences.english: So in the units we not only became jack, also become a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 所以在单位我们不但成了千斤顶，还成了受气包。

sentences.english: Even if their part was to have been a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 即使是他们的错误就在于一直在当受气包。

sentences.english: Shes born doormat, afraid of going against anything.
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是个受气包儿，什么事都不敢说个不字。

sentences.english: Lest my bewailed guilt should do thee shame.
sentences.chinese: 以免你因我的悲罪蒙羞受气。

sentences.english: The second was the female victim, great weakness and complete lack of physical tonus.
sentences.chinese: 第二个原型是受气的女人，导致她的肌肉软弱无力。

sentences.english: Hydration process belongs to diffusion control with exothermic reaction.
sentences.chinese: 由于水合过程受气液扩散控制，并且是放热反应。

sentences.english: Every time there was a fight in the playground, he seemed to end up as the punchbag.
sentences.chinese: 每次操场上有人打架，最终他就好像成了受气包。

sentences.english: You are a real punching bag before her.
sentences.chinese: 在她面前，你是个十足的受气包。

sentences.english: You are plain doormat. Why couldn't you say "NO"?
sentences.chinese: 你真是个受气包儿。你怎么就不能说个“不”字呢？

sentences.english: After suffering injustice for several years, today he has finally received understanding from the people around him.
sentences.chinese: 几年来他一直负屈受气，今天终于得到周围人的理解。

definition: pent-up frustration/petty annoyances
to be attacked by both sides in a quarrel/to be caught in the crossfire
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it

to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
to endure/to suffer/hardships/torments/a hard time/a nuisance
sinuous/devious/full details of a story/to stoop
to tire oneself out through overwork/to work oneself to death
to suffer bullying and beating (idiom)
servile
to grimace with displeasure/to pull a long face
to accept a compromise
to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
to receive a scolding
to be conciliatory or apologetic/to tread warily in dealing with sb
to call to come and shout to go (idiom); to yell orders/always bossing people around
